name: Ear Cleaner!
description:
Flip your ear cleaner correctly to flip into the ears of these poor people waiting for you to help them. Clean as many ears and collect as much earwax as you can. Don’t forget to throw your ear cleaner in the bin when you are done!    
Yuck! These people’s ears are full of earwax. You need to get your ear cleaner ready and help these guys feel clean again. Don’t forget to throw your ear cleaner in the bin when you are done!
